CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 15, 1939, pg. 7, reads: "Wednesday Bridge Club Hostesses to Beautiful Holiday Event at Loendi - Scenes at the Wednesday Bridge Club's Easter Monday party at Loendi... Right: Mrs. Alice Smith, Mrs. Hirchfield, Mrs. Hudson, Mrs. Juanita Tocas... Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women, including Alice Smith, Mrs. Hirchfield, Mrs. Hudson, and Juanita Tocas, seated around tables and playing bridge card game in Loendi Club
